name: nk-mysql
description: A mostly simple, yet powerful C++ data integration toolset for nodakwaeri (nk) or any application which would make use of it.  Featuring the MySQL C++ Connector from Oracle, nodamysql (nk-mysql) is designed to use Prepared Statements - and to allow implicit asynchronous usage - in order to help keep your application secure and efficient.
author: Richard Winters <rik@mmogp.com> (http://www.mmogp.com)
